DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase I/II study . In Phase I study , objective determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) combination therapy Aroplatin capecitabine subject unresectable , local recurrence distant metastases colorectal cancer refractory 5-FU/leucovorin irinotecan . In Phase II , primary objective evaluate response proportion duration Aroplatin/capecitabine therapy . Secondary objective evaluate frequency severity adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: Aroplatin Capecitabine Patients With Advanced Colorectal Cancer Resistant Standard Therapies
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I Primary Objective : - Determine MTD Aroplatin/capecitabine subject unresectable local recurrence distant metastases colorectal cancer refractory 5-FU/LV irinotecan . Phase II Primary Objective : - Evaluate response proportion duration Aroplatin/capecitabine therapy . Phase II Secondary Objective : - Evaluate frequency adverse event .
